entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
